title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook pasta in salted water until al dente.
Crisp pancetta; remove from heat.
Whisk eggs with cheese and pepper.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then off-heat add egg mixture; loosen with pasta water.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt + spices 30 min (or overnight).
Sear/grill chicken until just cooked.
Simmer tomato puree with butter and spices 10 min.
Add cream, then chicken; simmer 5–10 min.
Serve with rice/naan.

title: Lemon Garlic Pasta
summary: Bright, zesty pasta tossed with lemon, garlic, olive oil, and a sprinkle of parmesan.
steps: Cook pasta; reserve 1/2 cup cooking water.
Sauté garlic in olive oil gently (don’t brown).
Add lemon zest/juice and pasta water.
Toss pasta with sauce; finish with parmesan, salt, pepper.

title: Beef Stew
summary: Slow-cooked beef with carrots and potatoes in a rich, savory broth.
steps: Season + flour beef; brown in pot.
Sauté onion; add tomato paste; deglaze.
Add stock, bay; simmer 60 min.
Add carrots & potatoes; cook until tender.
Season to taste.

title: Veggie Burrito Bowl
summary: Rice, beans, salsa, corn, and fresh guac for a quick, hearty meal.
steps: Warm beans and corn; season.
Layer bowl: rice, beans, corn, lettuce.
Top with salsa, guacamole, lime juice.

title: Shakshuka
summary: Eggs poached in a spiced tomato and pepper sauce—perfect for brunch.
steps: Sauté onion, pepper, garlic with spices.
Add tomatoes; simmer to thicken.
Make wells; crack in eggs; cover until set.
Season and serve with bread.
